    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Gets the width of the (total) Tab view that is being used right now
        Returns:
        tab width

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Gets the height of the (total) Tab view that is being used right now
        Returns:
        tab height

      • getDefaultWidth

        public int getDefaultWidth()
        Gets the width of the default player list. This is the width that would be used if no tabs of greater size are created.
        Returns:
        default width

      • getDefaultHeight

        public int getDefaultHeight()
        Gets the height of the default player list. This is the height that would be used if no tabs of greater size are created.
        Returns:
        default height

      • setDefaultSize

        public void setDefaultSize()
        Sets the default player list dimensions based on the player maximum. Bukkit.getMaxPlayers() fails when BKCommonLib enabled, and thus this needs to be called the next tick after enabling.

      • requestNewSize

        public void requestNewSize(int width,
                  int height)
        Prepares the internal logic for the addition of a new tab dimension.
        Parameters:
        width - of the new tab
        height - of the new tab

      • refreshAllTabs

        public void refreshAllTabs()
        Forces all tabs to resend 'dirty' slot information to all their viewers.

      • showTab

        public void showTab(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
           TabView tab)
        Maps a tab to a player, telling it to start rendering this new Tab.
        Parameters:
        player - to map to
        tab - to map to the player

      • showTabToAll

        public void showTabToAll(TabView tab)
        Maps a tab to all current and future players, showing it's contents to everyone
        Parameters:
        tab - to show to all players

      • getCurrentTab

        public TabView getCurrentTab(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Gets the Tab View that a player is currently viewing
        Parameters:
        player - to get the Tab View for
        Returns:
        current player Tab View

      • reloadAll

        public void reloadAll(TabView tab)
        Reloads all text and ping values for a tab. This can be used when a large amount of changes occur.
        Parameters:
        tab - to reload
